overview: A happy couple, Whitney (Whitney Wright) and Lucas (Lucas Frost) discuss fulfilling each other's fantasies. Whitney starts by inviting a coworker (Isiah Maxwell) for a threesome. Then, it's Lucas' turn and he chooses their neighbor (Emma Starletto). Enjoying their fantasies so much, the horny couple invites both Isiah and Emma over for a foursome where fantasy meets reality!
title: Fantasy Couple 2
